meanings.definition: The act of lining or covering with fur.
meanings.sent1: The furring of the coat kept the animal warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The soft furring inside the jacket made it cozy to wear.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer used faux furring to create a stylish look.
meanings.sent4: The furring of clouds in the sky signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious furring on the collar added elegance to the coat.

meanings.definition: A material used to line or cover a surface.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used furring to insulate the walls.
meanings.sent2: The soft furring provided a comfortable cushion for the chair.
meanings.sent3: The artist used colorful furring to decorate the sculpture.
meanings.sent4: The furring of moss on the rocks created a natural carpet.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy furring on the pillow made it extra soft.

meanings.definition: The process of adding strips of wood or metal to a surface to create a level base for finishing work.
meanings.sent1: The furring of the wall helped to even out the surface for painting.
meanings.sent2: The furring of the ceiling was necessary before installing the lights.
meanings.sent3: The furring of the floor with metal strips made it sturdy for tiling.
meanings.sent4: The precise furring of the frame ensured a smooth finish for the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The careful furring of the door frame was essential for proper installation.
